message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,400,000. This is a significant opportunity, and I'm confident it will be a mutually beneficial deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,200,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, though. How about we settle on $1,300,000? It's a fair price that reflects the value of this product to you.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1,250,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.
